lapply(as.list(c("tidyverse","janitor","elevators","ggthemes",
                 "skimr","sf","mice","showtext")),
       require,character.only = TRUE) |> 
  suppressWarnings() |> 
  suppressMessages() |> 
  invisible()

ibm <- google_fonts("IBM Plex Sans")
font_install(ibm)
showtext_auto()
see code 
missingness <- function(a_vec){
 proportion <- round(100/length(a_vec)*a_vec[is.na(a_vec)] |> length(),2)
 return(proportion)}
see code 
Elevators <- elevators

Missing_Proportion <- sapply(Elevators,missingness) |> 
  as.data.frame()

Missing_Proportion <- cbind(rownames(Missing_Proportion),Missing_Proportion)
names(Missing_Proportion) <- c("variable","missing_proportion")
see code 
tibble(Missing_Proportion) |> print(n=25)

see code 
Elevators <- Elevators[,names(Elevators) %in% c(Missing_Proportion[Missing_Proportion$missing_proportion < 5,"variable"])]
see code 
Elevators |> 
ggplot(aes(longitude,latitude))+
  geom_point(aes(color = borough),
             show.legend = FALSE)+
  theme_void()+
  labs(title = "2022 NYC Elevators",
       subtitle = "NYC elevators across the five boroughs",
       x=NULL,y=NULL,
       caption = paste0("Plot: Sivuyile Nzimeni\nData Source: Hvitfeldt E (2022). _elevators: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC_.\nhttps://github.com/EmilHvitfeldt/elevators\n https://emilhvitfeldt.github.io/elevators/."))+
  theme(text = element_text(family = "IBM Plex Sans"),
        plot.title = element_text(face = "bold",hjust=0.5),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(face = "italic",hjust=0.5),
        plot.caption = element_text(face = "italic",size =3))
